[quote name="Redleg25" post=2169689]Pics emailed to all who have inquired so far. Lajoie is sold. I have a few hundred T206s I plan to list as I get time.  I'm always looking for off back Reds!![/QUOTE]
If you have that many to list I would suggest investing in a $225 scanner, you will increase your margin tremendously.

PM sent on the Matty

Bill
Anyone have a suggestion on a good scanner for cards?

[quote name="Silverbass" post=2169779]Anyone have a suggestion on a good scanner for cards?[/QUOTE]

Usually the best scanners for cards are CCD scanners, because they work for raw and graded cards. Some popular ones are the Epson v550/v600 and the Canon 
9000f Mark II, but there are a number of different CCD scanners.  

There have been a number of threads about scanners on the forum. [URL="https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=311247"]Here[/URL] is one from last week that goes into some more detail. Hope it helps!
